abstract: Samsung has agreed to pay Apple $548 million to settle a patent dispute, but their legal battle continues.
snippet: Samsung has agreed to pay Apple $548 million to settle a patent dispute, but their legal battle continues.
lead_paragraph: Samsung agreed to pay Apple $548 million to settle a smartphone patent dispute, but the payment won’t put an end to the long-running legal battles between the two companies.

headline.main: Samsung to Pay Apple $548 Million in Patent Dispute
